snippet: DanzAbierta uses a cabaret setting to contrast happy public faces and private anguish as part of the Cuba Festival at the Joyce Theater.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews performance by DanzAbierta as part of Cuba Festival at Joyce Theater.
lead_paragraph: DanzAbierta uses a cabaret setting to contrast happy public faces and private anguish as part of the Cuba Festival at the Joyce Theater.

headline.main: Review: ‘Showroom’ Shows That Show People Smile When They Are Low
headline.print_headline: Show People: They Smile When They Are Low
